ios.step1Desc: Make sure you're viewing this page in Safari browser. Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen.
ios.step2Desc: Scroll down in the share menu and tap "Add to Home Screen".
ios.step3Desc: Tap "Add" in the top right corner. CardGPT will now appear on your home screen like a native app.

android.step1Desc: Make sure you're viewing this page in Chrome browser. Tap the menu button (three dots) in the top right corner.
android.step2Desc: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home screen" from the menu.
android.step3Desc: Tap "Install" to confirm. CardGPT will now appear on your home screen like a native app.

section3.title: 3. Not Financial Advice Disclaimer

You should consult with qualified financial advisors before making any credit card application or financial decisions. section4.content: All credit card reward rates, benefits, promotions, and offers displayed on CardGPT are subject to change without notice. The actual rewards, terms, and conditions are determined solely by the respective card issuers and financial institutions. Thirdvisor Limited makes reasonable efforts to keep information current and accurate, but does not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or timeliness of any reward information. Users are strongly advised to verify all details directly with the card issuer before making any application or financial commitment. Thirdvisor Limited accepts no liability for any discrepancies between information shown on CardGPT and the actual terms offered by card issuers.

section5.title: 5. No Guarantee of Approval
section5.content: CardGPT provides recommendations based on transaction patterns and publicly available credit card information. We do not guarantee that you will be approved for any credit card we recommend. Credit card approval is subject to the issuing bank's credit assessment and eligibility criteria.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: CardGPT, operated by Thirdvisor Limited, collects transaction information that you voluntarily provide when using our Service, including transaction amounts, merchant names, and spending categories. We may also collect technical information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information for the purpose of providing and improving our Service.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: The information we collect is used solely to provide credit card recommendations based on your transaction patterns. We analyze your transaction data to match you with credit cards that may offer optimal rewards. We do not store your personal financial information or credit card numbers. All transaction analysis is performed in real-time and is not permanently retained on our servers.

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.content: Thirdvisor Limited does not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share aggregated, anonymized data for research and analytical purposes. We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our legal rights.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: Under Hong Kong's Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, you have the right to access and correct your personal data. Since CardGPT does not permanently store transaction information, there is limited personal data retained. You may contact us at any time regarding privacy concerns or to exercise your data rights.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.content: Thirdvisor Limited reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to this page. Your continued use of CardGPT after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
